description:
Gintoki insistence on saving Hajime has caused him to get badly hurt.  This match will be decided between Obi Hajime of the School of Beam Saber and Shimura Shinpachi of the 
School of Tendo Mushin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Liquor and Gasoline, Smiles and Tears
Sake to Gasoline to Egao to Namida
酒とガソリンと笑顔と涙
